City Council & Board of Adjustment
==================================

The City of Dripping Springs is a Type A General Law Municipality governed by a Mayor and five City Council members.  The Mayor and Council Members are elected At-Large, where Council Members are elected to Place.  Places 1, 3 and 5 have terms expiring in odd years and Places 2, 4 and the Mayor have terms expiring in even years.

The City Council also serves as the Board of Adjustment with the following seats:

* Chair, Bill Foulds, Jr.
* Board Member Taline Manassian
* Board Member Wade King
* Board Member Geoffrey Tahuahua
* Board Member Travis Crow
* Board Member Sherrie Parks

[Upcoming City Council & Board of Adjustment Meetings Calendar](https://drippingsprings-tx.municodemeetings.com/calendar/)
